list: Patio conversation set from the Atworth collection includes a coffee table and loveseat, so you can relax all evening long with a friend or your better half
Brown, rust-proof aluminum frame with an all-weather wicker back withstands the outdoor elements for use season after season
Solid olefin cushions are weather, mildew and stain-resistant for lasting outdoor durability
Peacock blue fabric complements the rich chocolate hue, bringing rustic charm to your backyard space
Coffee table provides a convenient place to rest your feet, refreshments or decorative items
5-Year frame warranty and 2-year fabric warranty give you peace of mind

specs.title: Ottoman Dimensions (L x W x H)

reviews.title: "Beautiful set!"
reviews.text: We love our set! We bought the couch, coffee table and 2 chairs for our screen porch and so far my daughter and husband have fallen asleep on the couch and the chair. Very comfortable. I may eventually add some gripping material for under the couch cushions bc they tend to want to walk apart. Throw pillows look great on it, but don't leave a whole lot of room for sitting.
reviews.author: WalkerB

reviews.title: "Horrible!!! Do not purchase!!"
reviews.text: We purchased a similar Allen & Roth set. We bought the loveseat, 4 chairs and coffee table. Spent almost $1600. Going into the third spring season and ALL of the cushions have split, ripped and has completely fallen apart. Just passed the two year warranty on the fabric. It's an OUTDOOR set. Should be able to handle the elements. We even brought the cushions indoors for the late fall and winter months. I spent the money hoping for quality. Can't believe we only used it for two summers. I want a refund or Lowe's to provide a new set of cushions! They just shrugged their shoulders and said sorry.
reviews.author: Renee

reviews.title: "Great buy for the price!"
reviews.text: After looking at a bazillion outdoor collections at stores and online we settled on this set.  It is a very good quality for this price range. I love the peacock blue color and the cushions have a nice fullness to them.  I did have to take a steamer to the back pillows as the corners had been crushed into a wrinkled mess from packaging.  They look great now.  Assembly was fairly easy, especially if you use your own socket wrench for chairs and and Allen wrench for loveseat.  This will cut the time in half. Be sure to follow directions that say to tighten screws only halfway.  That is key to lining things up. Finish tightening at the end!
reviews.author: Swarner

reviews.title: "Bad Product"
reviews.text: Not sure what the cushions are made of but they get burned by the sun. Had the furniture for 2 weeks and the cushions are not holding up. They are under a covered patio and still are turning black and melting.  So bizarre! We spent over $1,000 for the four piece set and we are very disappointed with the fabric quality.
reviews.author: Angie

reviews.title: "What a horrible experience"
reviews.text: My parents bought this set for me last year along with a rug and an umbrella. A week into having it one of the cushions was literally scorched black by the sun. I stored this set in my finished basement during the winter. Two weeks into spring and three more of my cushions have been scorched. I have been trying for two weeks to talk to someone about just getting my cushions replaced and I'm getting the run around. No one seems to know who the manufacturer is or who I'm supposed to talk to about replacing my cushions. I've called at least five different numbers and been transferred countless times. The website clearly shows I'm still under warranty but Allen + Roth is saying the warranty doesn't cover cushions exposed to elements. HELLO! It's outdoor furniture. I'm beyond frustrated and I refuse to pay $200 to replace my deep seat cushions for something that is out of my control. BUYER BEWARE!
reviews.author: Kelly

reviews.title: "Decent Furniture - Poor quality control"
reviews.text: We purchased the 4-piece set (which included 2 chairs and this set).  Ended up having to make three trips to Lowes to exchange for non-defective merchandise.  One of the chairs was sliced on the back, and the love seat couldn't be attached due to the captive nut was stripped.  Once I got past all of the quality control issues, it's not a bad set.  However, spending $900 for patio furniture, I would have expected higher quality than this.
reviews.author: Jamie

reviews.title: "Allen Roth set has faded terribly."
reviews.text: The finish on all pieces have bleached out in the sun. Cushions are still great, but the set is now an expensive embarrassment. Will Lowes stand behind this product?  The first to fade was coffee table and they wouldn't provide a replacement because the "set" could not be separated. This was last year and now all are shot.  Paid $1,200 for something we initially loved only to be subsequently "jilted".
reviews.author: Randy

reviews.title: "3 yrs later, Allen & Roth is junk"
reviews.text: We purchased a similar Allen & Roth conversation set 3 years ago this spring.  Last summer, it started to really show wear, with the finish on the aluminum totally wearing off.  Every time we set something on the table, even for just a few hours, it left a faded spot.  The finish has now completely worn away, leaving this set looking like total junk.  We spent a lot of time trying to find a piece of quality furniture that would last.  VERY disappointed in this brand, would not recommend.
reviews.author: mkwehnes

reviews.title: "i love this set"
reviews.text: Very easy to put together. They are nice and comfortable. I would of liked for the table to be a little heavier.
reviews.author: Happy

reviews.title: "Great conversation set"
reviews.text: Love this set - we keep it on covered patio so no issues with fading as I've seen others have had. The rocker chairs that match are my favorite. Throw some fun pillows and it looks great! Back pillows tend to slide but that's to be expected. Good value!
reviews.author: Sue

reviews.title: "Beautiful"
reviews.text: I bought this set and the rocking chairs and I love them both the wicker back is beautiful and comfortable. I just wish it was a little bigger, maybe three cushions wide other then that I love it.
reviews.author: P

reviews.title: "Ideas for a deck"
reviews.text: Very comfortable and will last for years.
reviews.author: Rudy

reviews.title: "Love it!!"
reviews.text: I love this set! I bought matching chairs and a matching rug. It looks fantastic!! There is a reason though that the instructions tell you to only tighten screws half way at the start. Then tighten them once all screws are in! I learned the hard way and had a lot of backing up to do! Really easy though to put together!!
reviews.author: Regina

reviews.title: "Love the rocking chairs!"
reviews.text: Everything came well boxed and protected, no defects in any of furniture. Comfortable and easy to put together. Looks great and pleased with the product.
reviews.author: Yvonne

reviews.title: "Comfortable"
reviews.text: I had to return first one due to a stripped thread which defeated purpose of home delivery. Besides that frustration second unit went together easily and looks good with the set.  Wood like finish on metal looks nice and color of pillows look good as well
reviews.author: Pressurewasher

reviews.title: "Good Product"
reviews.text: I love the blue cushions.  The furniture is the perfect height and are light enough to move easily where you want them.
reviews.author: IceblueEyes

reviews.title: "Missing hardware pack"
reviews.text: Hardware pack was missing so I had to return to the store. Irritating!  But a very helpful employee named Dean opened another box and gave me the hardwareOne of the sofa bolts would not screw in all the way. I was afraid it would break off so just left it out a bit. Should be fine seems tight. Not great but Ok
reviews.author: Jody

reviews.title: "Table Luv seat"
reviews.text: Table didn't set square on the floor so I had to kind of tweak it to get it to sit Square. Loveseat is not as comfortable as a matching chairs but there still nice.
reviews.author: Gary

reviews.title: "Relax"
reviews.text: Using this loveseat and table makes for a relaxing atmosphere for me, my friends and family.  The color makes the ambiance so mooring thus relaxed.
reviews.author: PJ

reviews.title: "Comfortable and relaxing"
reviews.text: Bought these for our patio room and they a great. Love the relaxation and comfort the provide.
reviews.author: Mac

reviews.title: "so comfortable!"
reviews.text: We spend a lot of time on our deck so we wanted something of quality and comfortable. These are as comfortable as we remember from the store. They arrived on the estimated arrival date and were free from dents and scratches. They were very heavy for pick up from the store and took two men and a truck to haul them. It took my husband less than an hour to put these chairs and the love seat and table together. I would definitely recommend this!
reviews.author: EmilyB

reviews.title: "Purchased the 4 piece seating set & love it!"
reviews.text: Excellent quality, super comfortable & looks great! Purchased the 4 piece conversation set add to other pieces on our deck & we are very satisfied.  Free delivery & set up--can't beat that!
reviews.author: Christine

reviews.title: "Comfortable and stylish"
reviews.text: Bought these after weeks of debate and glad we did. The couch is very comfortable and I've gotten many compliments on its style. Easy to put together.
reviews.author: CAzev

reviews.text: This was better than expected. Real easy to put together!
reviews.author: Chantel

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: Beautiful color.  Very comfortable.  High quality.  Highly recommend this and the matching chair.
reviews.author: BB

reviews.title: "Easy to assemble."
reviews.text: They seem to be made well & holding up fine. We are all average size people though.
reviews.author: patm2007

reviews.title: "Tamworth conversation set"
reviews.text: Comfortable and the color is vibrant without being brash. Delivery was on timt.
reviews.author: Katky

reviews.title: "Very comfortable"
reviews.text: Just as expected. So relaxing for the summer nights outdoors.
reviews.author: Jesse

reviews.title: "Comfortable / Good price"
reviews.text: Well priced and comfortable. Easy to assemble and well packaged.
reviews.author: BretLeeC

reviews.title: "Nice set"
reviews.text: The cushions are comfy. I like the aluminum because it's lighter for moving/storing. The assembly wasn't bad - table is easy, loveseat first step is  a little tricky with one person but definitely possible. Delivered from store in good condition.
reviews.author: CC

reviews.title: "Stands out with its light but stout construction"
reviews.text: Nicely detailed, upgraded bolts and pro welds easy on the eye and confidence in lasting comfort for this first patio set. Shopped botiques and big stores and this set, chairs and table, had look and actual quality of higher end sets.
reviews.author: nando

reviews.title: "Great patio furniture"
reviews.text: This furniture is comfortable and good looking.  When paired with the matching chairs, it makes for great conversation seating. Color choice are good and there are lots of color coordinating pillows to choose from.
reviews.author: Beth

reviews.title: "Patio Set and Swivel Chairs"
reviews.text: We just purchased the Allen & Roth Atworth Conversation Set and two swivel chairs.  We love it!  It will be in an enclosed lanai so we hope we do not have the problems some of the other reviewers had.
reviews.author: CarolA

reviews.text: Lowes has the best product on the market.Marlene is the best sales person that I haveevery met.
reviews.author: Robbie

reviews.title: "Quality Comfort Value"
reviews.text: We purchased the set. The quality and comfort is great for the price. Was extremely easy to assemble. You do need to cover the set during pollen season and winter.
reviews.author: MaryW

reviews.title: "Not for full sun!"
reviews.text: The finish on the aluminum furniture in full sun will last only as long as the warranty. Ours is 3 years old and is faded and looks awful. We wasted our money.
reviews.author: Patrick

reviews.title: "Easy to assemble"
reviews.text: Easy to assemble.   Unfortunately they don't sell the love seat separate.  I didn't want the table as it didn't fit on my porch so it went into the trash.
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "Great patio set. Stylish and comfortable"
reviews.text: We purchased this love seat and 2 rocker chairs for our new patio. It's a great set that is very comfortable with great style.
reviews.author: Tod

reviews.title: "Comfortable at a reasonable price."
reviews.text: Comfortable chairs. Caught the set on sale & saved a bundle. This set stayed within budget & is nice looking but not opulent.
reviews.author: JimO

reviews.text: Great price and it is very comfortable. We're able to relax and put your feet up. I love this set and would buy again.
reviews.author: Maria

reviews.title: "I love my set"
reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and very sturdy design gives my patio area a warm and elegant appearance.
reviews.author: tina

reviews.title: "Outdoor Seating"
reviews.text: The overall quality and price can't be beat. Very comfortable.
reviews.author: Jon

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: James

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: bill

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Doc

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Neal

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Scotty

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: leo

questions.question: "My top cushions have been ripped by my dog. Can i order these replacement cushions?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: These cushions are available please contact 1-866-267-7772.

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Sunbrella replacement cushions can be purchased on Lowes.com.

questions.question: "Do the cushions absorb water in the rain?"
questions.author: WD

answers.author: Ray
answers.text: The cushions may be left out in the weather; rain will not damage them. The cushions will take on water in a heavy rain. After a heavy rain, cushions will dry quickest by standing them on their side and leaving them in the sun for a few hours.

questions.question: "What is the size of the box it comes in? need to know if it will fit in my SUV"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Thank you for your interest in the Atworth Conversation Set. The box size is L53.1”xW36.8”xH28.7”

questions.question: "How do you clean the cushions. I need to remove pollen and dust. Thanks"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: The Atworth cushions can be cleaned using warm water and soap.

questions.question: "Can i find the hardware list and assembly insteuctions on line?"
questions.author: heather

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Thank you for your interest in the Atworth 2-Piece Frame conversation set. You can find the assembly instructions on lowes.com under guides and documents.

questions.question: "What products do you use to clean the table with?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Thank you for your interest in the Atworth 2 piece Conversation chairs. The chairs can be cleaned with warm water and mild soap.

questions.question: "I have been looking at this piece for about a month, since it is the end of the season, will it be going on sale soon?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Thanks for your question. At this point this collection will not be going on sale.

questions.question: "I only have interest in the display model at the Lowes near me. I don't want the table. What is the best price I can get the love seat?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Thanks for your question! This is currently sold as a set.

questions.question: "Can you order the coffee table seperately"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: I'm sorry, the coffee table is not sold separately.
